name: Craig Morgan Teicher
bio: Craig Morgan Teicher's most recent book is To Keep Love Blurry (BOA Editions, 2012). He is editing the selected writings of Delmore Schwartz and working on a collection of essays. His poems appear in the Yale Review, Boston Review, Pleiades, Seneca Review, the Brooklyn Rail, and other publications. Reviews and other prose can be found in Poets & Writers, the Georgia Review, and elsewhere. He lives in northern New Jersey.
